entity.query: select ListType.listTypeId from ListType where

select DISTINCT rsm.rsTransRefNo, rsm.formulaMethodId, rsm.paymentFrequency, rsm.rsTransRefName, rsm.modifiedDate, rsm.parentRsName, rsm.parentRsId, rsm.rebatePlanLevel, rsm.inboundStatus, rsm.rsStatus, rsm.modifiedBy, rsm.rsNo, rsm.paymentMethod, rsm.zipCode, rsm.internalNotes, rsm.recordLockStatus, rsm.rsDesignation, rsm.rsTransRefId, rsm.rsName, rsm.rebateProgramType, rsm.interestBearingBasis, rsm.city, rsm.rebateProcessingType, rsm.state, rsm.rebateFrequency, rsm.rsId, rsm.makePayableTo, rsm.createdBy, rsm.createdDate, rsm.rsModelSid, rsm.tradeClass, rsm.interestBearingIndicator, rsm.paymentTerms, rsm.address1, rsm.rsType, rsm.address2, rsm.validationProfile, rsm.rsCategory, rsm.calendar, rsm.rsStartDate, rsm.paymentGracePeriod, rsm.batchId, rsm.rsEndDate from RsModel rsm, RsDetails rsd,ItemMaster im where rsm.rsModelSid=rsd.rsModelSid and rsd.itemMasterSid=im.itemMasterSid

select DISTINCT ifp.ifpNo, ifp.ifpName, ifp.ifpType, ifp.ifpStartDate, ifp.ifpEndDate, ifp.ifpModelSid from IfpModel ifp, IfpDetails ifpd, ItemMaster im where ifp.ifpModelSid=ifpd.ifpModelSid and ifpd.itemMasterSid=im.itemMasterSid

DECLARE @TEMP_RS_MODEL TABLE (RS_MODEL_SID INT) INSERT INTO @TEMP_RS_MODEL (RS_MODEL_SID) SELECT DISTINCT rsd.RS_MODEL_SID FROM RS_DETAILS rsd LEFT JOIN ITEM_MASTER im ON im.ITEM_MASTER_SID = rsd.ITEM_MASTER_SID WHERE im.ITEM_NO LIKE '?ITEM_NO' AND im.ITEM_NAME LIKE '?ITEM_NAME';

SELECT DISTINCT rs.RS_MODEL_SID, rs.RS_ID AS RS_ID, rs.RS_NO AS RS_NO, rs.RS_NAME AS RS_NAME, rs.RS_STATUS, rs.RS_TYPE, rs.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE, htype.DESCRIPTION AS rtype, hstatus.DESCRIPTION AS rstatus, hpstatus.DESCRIPTION AS rptype, hcategory.DESCRIPTION AS rscategory, rs.RS_START_DATE, rs.RS_END_DATE, hdesignation.DESCRIPTION AS rsdesignation, rs.PARENT_RS_ID AS PARENT_RS_ID, rs.PARENT_RS_NAME AS PARENT_RS_NAME, rs.RECORD_LOCK_STATUS, htradeclass.DESCRIPTION AS TRADE_CLASS, rs.RS_ALIAS AS RS_ALIAS, hrebatefrequncy.DESCRIPTION AS REBATE_FREQUENCY, hcalendar.DESCRIPTION AS CALENDAR, hcalculationtype.DESCRIPTION AS CALCULATION_TYPE, hcalculationlevel.DESCRIPTION AS CALCULATION_LEVEL, hrebateruleltype.DESCRIPTION AS REBATE_RULE_TYPE, rs.REBATE_RULE_ASSOCIATION AS REBATE_RULE_ASSOCIATION, hpaymenterms.DESCRIPTION AS PAYMENT_TERMS, hpaymentmethod.DESCRIPTION AS PAYMENT_METHOD, rs.PAYMENT_GRACE_PERIOD AS PAYMENT_GRACE_PERIOD, hpaymentfrequency.DESCRIPTION AS PAYMENT_FREQUENCY, rs.INTEREST_BEARING_INDICATOR AS INTEREST_BEARING_INDICATOR, rs.INTEREST_BEARING_BASIS AS INTEREST_BEARING_BASIS, rs.RS_TRANS_REF_ID AS RS_TRANS_REF_ID, rs.RS_TRANS_REF_NAME AS RS_TRANS_REF_NAME, hudc1.DESCRIPTION AS UDC1, hudc2.DESCRIPTION AS UDC2, hudc3.DESCRIPTION AS UDC3, hudc4.DESCRIPTION AS UDC4, hudc5.DESCRIPTION AS UDC5, hudc6.DESCRIPTION AS UDC6

FROM RS_MODEL rs JOIN @TEMP_RS_MODEL trs ON rs.RS_MODEL_SID = trs.RS_MODEL_SID LEFT JOIN HElPER_TABLE htype ON htype.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.RS_TYPE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hstatus ON hstatus.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.RS_STATUS LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hpstatus ON hpstatus.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hcategory ON hcategory.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.RS_CATEGORY LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hdesignation ON hdesignation.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.RS_DESIGNATION LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE htradeclass ON htradeclass.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.RS_TRADE_CLASS LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hrebatefrequncy ON hrebatefrequncy.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.REBATE_FREQUENCY LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hcalendar ON hcalendar.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.RS_CALENDAR LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hcalculationtype ON hcalculationtype.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.CALCULATION_TYPE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hcalculationlevel ON hcalculationlevel.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.CALCULATION_LEVEL LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hrebateruleltype ON hrebateruleltype.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.REBATE_RULE_TYPE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hpaymenterms ON hpaymenterms.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.PAYMENT_TERMS LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hpaymentmethod ON hpaymentmethod.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.PAYMENT_METHOD LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hpaymentfrequency ON hpaymentfrequency.HELPER_TABLE_SID = rs.PAYMENT_FREQUENCY LEFT JOIN UDCS udcs ON udcs.MASTER_SID = rs.RS_MODEL_SID AND udcs.MASTER_TYPE LIKE 'RS_MODEL' LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hudc1 ON hudc1.HELPER_TABLE_SID = udcs.UDC1 LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hudc2 ON hudc2.HELPER_TABLE_SID = udcs.UDC2 LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hudc3 ON hudc3.HELPER_TABLE_SID = udcs.UDC3 LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hudc4 ON hudc4.HELPER_TABLE_SID = udcs.UDC4 LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hudc5 ON hudc5.HELPER_TABLE_SID = udcs.UDC5 LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE hudc6 ON hudc6.HELPER_TABLE_SID = udcs.UDC6 WHERE rs.INBOUND_STATUS != 'D'

SELECT RP.REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID, RP.REBATE_PLAN_ID, RP.REBATE_PLAN_NO, RP.REBATE_PLAN_NAME, RP.REBATE_PLAN_STATUS, RP.REBATE_PLAN_TYPE, RP.REBATE_STRUCTURE, RP.REBATE_RANGE_BASED_ON, NSF.NET_SALES_FORMULA_NAME, CDR.RULE_NAME, RP.REBATE_BASED_ON, RP.CREATED_DATE, RP.CREATED_BY, RP.MODIFIED_DATE, RP.MODIFIED_BY FROM REBATE_PLAN_MASTER RP LEFT JOIN CDR_MODEL CDR ON CDR.CDR_MODEL_SID = RP.CDR_MODEL_SID LEFT JOIN NET_SALES_FORMULA_MASTER NSF ON NSF.NET_SALES_FORMULA_MASTER_SID = RP.NET_SALES_FORMULA_MASTER_SID WHERE RP.REBATE_PLAN_ID LIKE '@REBATE_PLAN_ID' AND RP.REBATE_PLAN_NO LIKE '@REBATE_PLAN_NO' AND RP.REBATE_PLAN_NAME LIKE '@REBATE_PLAN_NAME'

SELECT COUNT(RP.REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID) FROM REBATE_PLAN_MASTER RP LEFT JOIN CDR_MODEL CDR ON CDR.CDR_MODEL_SID = RP.CDR_MODEL_SID LEFT JOIN NET_SALES_FORMULA_MASTER NSF ON NSF.NET_SALES_FORMULA_MASTER_SID = RP.NET_SALES_FORMULA_MASTER_SID WHERE RP.REBATE_PLAN_ID LIKE '@REBATE_PLAN_ID' AND RP.REBATE_PLAN_NO LIKE '@REBATE_PLAN_NO' AND RP.REBATE_PLAN_NAME LIKE '@REBATE_PLAN_NAME'

INSERT INTO RS_MODEL (RS_ID, RS_NO, RS_NAME, RS_TYPE, REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE, RS_STATUS,RS_CATEGORY, RS_TRADE_CLASS, RS_DESIGNATION, RS_ALIAS, RS_TRANS_REF_ID, RS_TRANS_REF_NAME, PARENT_RS_ID, PARENT_RS_NAME, RS_CALENDAR, REBATE_FREQUENCY, PAYMENT_FREQUENCY, PAYMENT_GRACE_PERIOD, INTEREST_BEARING_BASIS, INTEREST_BEARING_INDICATOR, PAYMENT_LEVEL, PAYMENT_TERMS, PAYMENT_METHOD, REBATE_RULE_TYPE, CALCULATION_TYPE, CALCULATION_LEVEL, RS_START_DATE, RS_END_DATE, RECORD_LOCK_STATUS, INTERNAL_NOTES, INBOUND_STATUS, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE)
VALUES ('@RS_ID', '@RS_NO', '@RS_NAME', @RS_TYPE, @REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE, @RS_STATUS, @RS_CATEGORY, @TRADE_CLASS, @RS_DESIGNATION, '@RS_ALIAS', '@RS_TRANS_REF_ID', '@RS_TRANS_REF_NAME', '@PARENT_RS_ID', '@PARENT_RS_NAME', @RS_CALENDAR, @REBATE_FREQUENCY, @PAYMENT_FREQUENCY, '@PAYMENT_GRACE_PERIOD', @INTEREST_BEARING_BASIS, @INTEREST_BEARING_INDICATOR, @PAYMENT_LEVEL, @PAYMENT_TERMS, @PAYMENT_METHOD, @REBATE_RULE_TYPE, @CALCULATION_TYPE, @CALCULATION_LEVEL, '@RS_START_DATE', '@RS_END_DATE', @RECORD_LOCK_STATUS, '@INTERNAL_NOTES', '@INBOUND_STATUS', @CREATED_BY, @MODIFIED_BY, '@CREATED_DATE', '@MODIFIED_DATE');

UPDATE RS_MODEL SET RS_ID = '@RS_ID', RS_NO = '@RS_NO', RS_NAME = '@RS_NAME', RS_TYPE = @RS_TYPE, REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE = @REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE, RS_STATUS = @RS_STATUS, RS_CATEGORY = @RS_CATEGORY, RS_TRADE_CLASS = @TRADE_CLASS, RS_DESIGNATION = @RS_DESIGNATION, RS_ALIAS = '@RS_ALIAS', RS_TRANS_REF_ID = '@RS_TRANS_REF_ID', RS_TRANS_REF_NAME = '@RS_TRANS_REF_NAME', PARENT_RS_ID = '@PARENT_RS_ID', PARENT_RS_NAME = '@PARENT_RS_NAME', RS_CALENDAR = @RS_CALENDAR, REBATE_FREQUENCY = @REBATE_FREQUENCY, PAYMENT_FREQUENCY = @PAYMENT_FREQUENCY, PAYMENT_GRACE_PERIOD = '@PAYMENT_GRACE_PERIOD', INTEREST_BEARING_BASIS = @INTEREST_BEARING_BASIS, INTEREST_BEARING_INDICATOR = @INTEREST_BEARING_INDICATOR, PAYMENT_LEVEL = @PAYMENT_LEVEL, PAYMENT_TERMS = @PAYMENT_TERMS, PAYMENT_METHOD = @PAYMENT_METHOD, REBATE_RULE_TYPE = @REBATE_RULE_TYPE, CALCULATION_TYPE = @CALCULATION_TYPE, CALCULATION_LEVEL = @CALCULATION_LEVEL, RS_START_DATE = '@RS_START_DATE', RS_END_DATE = '@RS_END_DATE', RECORD_LOCK_STATUS = @RECORD_LOCK_STATUS, INTERNAL_NOTES = '@INTERNAL_NOTES', INBOUND_STATUS = '@INBOUND_STATUS', MODIFIED_BY = @MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_DATE = '@MODIFIED_DATE' WHERE RS_MODEL_SID = @RS_MODEL_SID;

SELECT DISTINCT (CAST( CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(RS_MODEL_SID) FROM RS_MODEL WHERE RS_ID LIKE '@RS_ID' AND INBOUND_STATUS = 'D' ) <> 0 THEN 'RS_ID' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(RS_MODEL_SID) FROM RS_MODEL WHERE RS_NO LIKE '@RS_NO' AND INBOUND_STATUS = 'D' ) <> 0 THEN 'RS_NO' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(RS_MODEL_SID) FROM RS_MODEL WHERE RS_NAME LIKE '@RS_NAME' AND INBOUND_STATUS = 'D' ) <> 0 THEN 'RS_NAME' ELSE 'NEW' END AS varchar)) as DUPLICATE FROM RS_MODEL;

SELECT FORECASTING_FORMULA_SID AS FORMULA_ID, FORMULA_NO, FORMULA_NAME, formulaType.HELPER_TABLE_SID AS forType_Id, formulaType.DESCRIPTION AS forType FROM dbo.FORECASTING_FORMULA FF LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE formulaType ON formulaType.HELPER_TABLE_SID = FF.FORMULA_TYPE WHERE FORECASTING_FORMULA_SID LIKE '@FORMULA_ID' AND FORMULA_NO LIKE '@FORMULA_NO' AND FORMULA_NAME LIKE '@FORMULA_NAME' AND formulaType.HELPER_TABLE_SID LIKE '@FORMULA_TYPE'

SELECT Count(FORECASTING_FORMULA_SID) FROM dbo.FORECASTING_FORMULA FF LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE formulaType ON formulaType.HELPER_TABLE_SID = FF.FORMULA_TYPE WHERE FORECASTING_FORMULA_SID LIKE '@FORMULA_ID' AND FORMULA_NO LIKE '@FORMULA_NO' AND FORMULA_NAME LIKE '@FORMULA_NAME' AND formulaType.HELPER_TABLE_SID LIKE '@FORMULA_TYPE'

UPDATE IMTD_RS_DETAILS SET RS_DETAILS_FORMULA_NO = '@RS_DETAILS_FORMULA_NO', RS_DETAILS_FORMULA_NAME = '@RS_DETAILS_FORMULA_NAME', RS_DETAILS_FORMULA_ID = '@RS_DETAILS_FORMULA_ID' WHERE USERS_SID LIKE '@USERS_SID' AND SESSION_ID LIKE '@SESSION_ID' AND "OPERATION" != 'D' AND CHECK_RECORD = 1;

UPDATE dbo.IMTD_RS_DETAILS SET REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID = '@REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID', RS_DETAILS_REBATE_PLAN_NAME = '@RS_DETAILS_REBATE_PLAN_NAME' WHERE USERS_SID LIKE '@USERS_SID' AND SESSION_ID LIKE '@SESSION_ID' AND "OPERATION" != 'D' AND CHECK_RECORD = 1;

UPDATE dbo.IMTD_RS_DETAILS SET REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID = '@REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID', RS_DETAILS_REBATE_PLAN_NAME = '@RS_DETAILS_REBATE_PLAN_NAME' WHERE USERS_SID LIKE '@USERS_SID' AND SESSION_ID LIKE '@SESSION_ID' AND "OPERATION" != 'D';

UPDATE IMTD_RS_DETAILS SET RS_DETAILS_ATTACHED_STATUS = 0, ITEM_REBATE_START_DATE = NULL, ITEM_REBATE_END_DATE = NULL, CHECK_RECORD = 0, RS_DETAILS_ATTACHED_DATE = NULL, REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID = NULL, RS_DETAILS_REBATE_PLAN_NAME = NULL, RS_DETAILS_BUNDLE_NO = NULL WHERE USERS_SID = @USERS_SID AND SESSION_ID = @SESSION_ID;

UPDATE IMTD_RS_DETAILS SET RS_DETAILS_ATTACHED_STATUS = 0, ITEM_REBATE_START_DATE = NULL, ITEM_REBATE_END_DATE = NULL, CHECK_RECORD = 0, RS_DETAILS_ATTACHED_DATE = NULL, RS_DETAILS_FORMULA_ID = NULL, RS_DETAILS_FORMULA_NO = NULL, RS_DETAILS_FORMULA_NAME = NULL WHERE USERS_SID = @USERS_SID AND SESSION_ID = @SESSION_ID;

UPDATE IMTD_RS_DETAILS SET RS_DETAILS_ATTACHED_STATUS = 0, ITEM_REBATE_START_DATE = NULL, ITEM_REBATE_END_DATE = NULL, CHECK_RECORD = 0, RS_DETAILS_ATTACHED_DATE = NULL WHERE USERS_SID = @USERS_SID AND SESSION_ID = @SESSION_ID;

UPDATE IMTD_RS_DETAILS SET DEDUCTION_CALENDAR_MASTER_SID = '@DEDUCTION_CALENDAR_MASTER_SID', RS_DETAILS_DEDUCTION_CALENDAR_NO = '@RS_DETAILS_DEDUCTION_CALENDAR_NO', RS_DETAILS_DEDUCTION_CALENDAR_NAME = '@RS_DETAILS_DEDUCTION_CALENDAR_NAME' WHERE USERS_SID LIKE '@USERS_SID' AND SESSION_ID LIKE '@SESSION_ID' AND "OPERATION" != 'D'

UPDATE IMTD_RS_DETAILS SET NET_SALES_FORMULA_MASTER_SID = '@NET_SALES_FORMULA_MASTER_SID', RS_DETAILS_NET_SALES_FORMULA_NO = '@RS_DETAILS_NET_SALES_FORMULA_NO', RS_DETAILS_NET_SALES_FORMULA_NAME = '@RS_DETAILS_NET_SALES_FORMULA_NAME' WHERE USERS_SID LIKE '@USERS_SID' AND SESSION_ID LIKE '@SESSION_ID' AND "OPERATION" != 'D'

UPDATE IMTD_RS_DETAILS SET NET_SALES_RULE ='@NET_SALES_RULE'
WHERE USERS_SID LIKE '@USERS_SID' AND SESSION_ID LIKE '@SESSION_ID' AND "OPERATION" != 'D'

UPDATE IMTD_RS_DETAILS SET
CALCULATION_RULE = '@CALCULATION_RULE' WHERE USERS_SID LIKE '@USERS_SID' AND SESSION_ID LIKE '@SESSION_ID' AND "OPERATION" != 'D'

UPDATE IMTD_RS_DETAILS SET EVALUATION_RULE = '@EVALUATION_RULE'
WHERE USERS_SID LIKE '@USERS_SID' AND SESSION_ID LIKE '@SESSION_ID' AND "OPERATION" != 'D'

SELECT FORMULA FROM (SELECT FORECASTING_FORMULA_SID AS FORMULA_ID, FORMULA, FORMULA_NO, FORMULA_NAME, formulaType.HELPER_TABLE_SID AS forType_Id, formulaType.DESCRIPTION AS forType FROM dbo.FORECASTING_FORMULA FF LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE formulaType ON formulaType.HELPER_TABLE_SID = FF.FORMULA_TYPE WHERE FORECASTING_FORMULA_SID LIKE '@FORECASTING_FORMULA_SID' AND FORMULA_NO LIKE '@FORMULA_NO' AND FORMULA_NAME LIKE '@FORMULA_NAME' AND formulaType.HELPER_TABLE_SID LIKE '@FORMULA_TYPE')A WHERE FORMULA_ID LIKE '@FORMULA_ID'
